com.tinmegali.security.mcipher

Class MDecryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MDecryptorDefault

  • public class MDecryptor
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility Class to Decrypt a byte[] that was encrypted with MEncryptor.

    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String alias,
                                byte[] encryptedData)
                         throws DecryptorException
        Decrypt a given byte array, returning a decrypted String.
        Parameters:
        alias - an unique id, used to store the SecretKey or KeyPair in the KeyStore during the encryption process.
        encryptedData - a byte array with the encrypted data. If the encryption process used the AES algorithm, the data must contain the Vector IV. In fact, the encrypted data must by a serializable MEncryptedObject, containing the vector iv information.
        Returns:
        a decrypted String.
        Throws:
        DecryptorException - wraps all possible exception for the decryption process. To access the original exception call Throwable.getCause().

      • decryptLargeData

        public byte[] decryptLargeData(java.lang.String alias,
                               byte[] encryptedData,
                               android.content.Context context)
                        throws DecryptorException
        Uses AES algorithm to decrypt large chunks of data. If the method is called from SDK 23+, it will make a standard decryption operation, calling decrypt(String, byte[]). If the method id called from SDK < 23, it will make the decryption using an AES algorithm, from the Bouncy Castle provider calling wrapperCipher(String, Context) to get the cipher and then calling decryptData(byte[], Cipher) providing the cipher.
        Parameters:
        alias - unique identifier to get/generate the standard SecretKey
        encryptedData - encrypted data
        context - current Context.
        Returns:
        a byte array with the decrypted data.
        Throws:
        DecryptorException - for any errors.
